name: @aws-lambda/aws-serverless-express-handler
description: Handler for AWS Serverless Express (AWS Lambda)

scripts.test: yarn test:prettier && yarn test:eslint && yarn test:unit
scripts.test:unit: nyc --check-coverage --exclude tests --extension .ts --lines 90 --reporter=text --reporter=html ts-mocha --project tsconfig.build.json --require source-map-support/register --recursive tests/**/*.ts

author: City of Los Angeles
